description:
Qingtui, an intelligent way to work

Qingtui, produced by CISDI, a subsidiary of China Minmetals Corporation, is an intelligent office platform that combines instant messaging, office collaboration, enterprise management, connectivity and integration, intelligent hardware, domain informationization solutions and more capabilities.
1. 支持设置联系人备注、群昵称
2. 支持更多类型消息的回复
3. 支持扫码加入内部群
source: 中冶赛迪信息技术（重庆）有限公司
